
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">支付宝<br>网商银行部分可领1.8元红包，比如用于还款<a target="_blank" href="https://render.alipay.com/p/s/i/?scheme=alipays%3A%2F%2Fplatformapi%2Fstartapp%3FappId%3D20000067%26url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Frender.alipay.com%252Fp%252Fc%252F180020870000013120%252Findex.html%253FcaprMode%253Dsync%2526chinfo%253DMYBANK_BANNER_B%2526trace%253Dtrue%2526scm%253D1.cdp._.3202454605213._._._%2526__webview_options__%253DbizScenario%25253DMYBANK_BANNER_B.141700007.2202458371832.3202454605213%26fxzjshareChinfo%3Dch_share__chsub_CopyLink%26chInfo%3Dch_share__chsub_CopyLink%26shareTimestamp%3D1735138869785%26apshareid%3D071869e1-e759-4cb7-b880-e54343ac140c%26shareBizType%3DztokenV0_VhKxOcrh">https://render.alipay.com/p/s/i/?scheme=alipays%3A%2F%2Fp…</a> 
<p class="pl">不符</p><p class="pl">领了还了</p>
